name: Białasek
bio: Białasek is one of the twins. Her name means, in a way, "white cat", because she has a white belly. She is 10 years old and likes to sit on wet towels.

name: Czarnuszka
bio: Czarnuszka is Białasek's sister. Her name means "black cat". She likes to play on a game console with me and eat potato chips.

name: Kluska
bio: She is my wife's favorite cat. Kluska is 9 years old, but she is the smallest cat of all. Her name means "dumpling". She likes to play and pose for pictures.

name: Licho
bio: Licho is my favorite cat. He is 7 years old. His name means "devil" in Polish folklore. He likes to eat a lot, play with me and watch the birds.
